p: A search for information on the subject was made, using as inclusion criteria all the articles, books and official web pages published to date (June 2020). In this study, published peer-reviewed articles without language restrictions (unpublished data were not included) in repositories such as PubMed, ScienceDirect, Worldwide science, Springer link, Refseek, SciELO, Cochrane Library were considered as primary sources. Secondary sources of information included data from official web pages and books of taxonomic, botanical, cultivation and vulnerability information of the P. protopunica Balf., species with the keywords: Punica protopunica Balf., wild pomegranate, Socotra pomegranate, Punica granatum L., Punica gender, Lythraceae, Myrtales, Punica protopunica taxonomy, health effects, biological effects, composition, chemistry, cultivation, distribution and morphology.
